title: Sound On: Jan. 6th Commission, China
itunes:title: Sound On: Jan. 6th Commission, China
description:
Guests: Lester Munson, Principal at the BGR Group and Mark Schweiker, former Governor of Pennsylvania and Senior Vice President at Renmatrix Inc.

Bloomberg's David Westin spoke exclusively to Republican West Virginia Senator Shelley Moore Capito about her role as the top GOP negotiator with the White House on a bipartisan approach to infrastructure.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
